This is based on the collective learning strategy, where a local structure is obtained at each site and the global structure is obtained by cross learning and combining. Local learning is used to identify the local structure of local nodes and local links of cross nodes from local sample data sets. Cross learning can find the entire cross-links of cross nodes.
